casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Warren Robert GREGORY. No. 232A93-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 29, 2016. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, for State of N.C. William H. Durham, Attorney at Law, for Gregory, Warren Robert. Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 12th of October 2015 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Pitt County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016."
